attributes.action: Enact the strongest sanctions against Russia to protect the Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: We recognise that these sanctions may have a negative impact on our quality of life, but stand with out fellow humans to protect their lives. We hope that the government will take steps to protect those most impacted by this nationally.
attributes.background: We request that the strongest possible sanctions are taken against Russia in response to their military action against the Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on this topic, which you might like to sign

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
